title: 2 Quick & Easy Ways to Cancel Your Regal Unlimited Subscription

steps.title: Email customersupport@regalcinemas.com.
steps.content: Email customersupport@regalcinemas.com. Title the subject of your email “Request to Cancel Regal Unlimited Subscription.” Simply explain your reason for canceling and provide your Regal card number or account number in the body of the email.

steps.title: Wait for a response from Regal within 24 to 48 hours.
steps.content: Wait for a response from Regal within 24 to 48 hours. Regal customer support typically responds to messages within 24 to 48 hours. They will email you back to let you know if they can cancel your subscription and when the cancelation will be effective. [1] X Research source Regal should send you confirmation that your account is canceled. If they do not, email them for confirmation. Note : When you cancel your Unlimited subscription, Regal prevents you from applying to another subscription until 6 months pass from your cancellation date.

steps.title: Send a DM to Regal’s Facebook, X, or Instagram account.
steps.content: Send a DM to Regal’s Facebook , X , or Instagram account. Regal also processes cancellations through their official social media accounts. Just send a private DM through your preferred site, ask the agent to cancel your unlimited subscription, and provide your Regal card or account number. [2] X Research source The Regal customer service agent might need your email address or other account details to process your request. Regal’s official social media accounts : Facebook: RegalMovies X/Twitter: @RegalMovies Instagram: @regalmovies TikTok: @regalmovies

steps.title: Give Regal 24 to 48 hours to respond to your request.
steps.content: Give Regal 24 to 48 hours to respond to your request. It might take Regal 24 to 48 hours to respond to your DM. When they respond, they’ll let you know if they can cancel your Unlimited subscription and when it will take effect. The customer service agent should message you confirmation that your account is canceled. If they do not, ask them to email or DM you with confirmation.

steps.title: Regal accepts cancellations after your initial subscription term ends.
steps.content: Regal accepts cancellations after your initial subscription term ends. While you can request a cancellation at any time, Regal does not process cancellations until your initial Unlimited subscription term ends. This may be after 3 months or 1 year, depending on the subscription term you signed up for. [3] X Research source For instance, if you signed up for a 3-month subscription, you can’t cancel until the 3 months are up. If you submit a cancellation request 2 months into the initial term, you still have to pay for the full 3 months. Regal accepts cancellations during your initial term in some cases : You have a medical condition preventing you from using your subscription for 3 consecutive months. You’re moving outside of the US, Guam, Saipan, or American Samoa.

steps.title: Cancellations are effective at the end of next month’s billing cycle.
steps.content: Cancellations are effective at the end of next month’s billing cycle. After your initial Unlimited subscription is up, Regal automatically moves you to a monthly subscription. Once you make a cancellation request, Regal sets your subscription to stop at the end of the next month’s billing cycle. [4] X Research source For instance, if you’re billed on the tenth of the month and you cancel your subscription on June 1, your cancellation will be effective on August 10. Check when your next bill date is scheduled for by signing into Regal’s mobile app .

steps.title: Regal offers refunds on a case-by-case basis.
steps.content: Regal offers refunds on a case-by-case basis. According to Regal’s Unlimited subscription terms, they can refund some of your up-front subscription fees. [5] X Research source Simply email Regal customer service at customersupport@regalcinemas.com about getting a refund, or reach out to them on one of their official social media sites.
